title: Ticket #6498: condor_rm -all pauses all late materialization
description:
There is a Owner Check missing in the queue management handler for condor_rm such that when condor_rm is called with an argument that matches a cluster ad, (such as -all), and that cluster has a late materialization factory, the factory will be paused even if that cluster is not owned by the user issuing the command.

Thus when any user issues a condor_rm -all command, all late materialization factories will be placed into a terminal hold state and all late materialization will cease until the schedd is restarted.
